alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 02 at 11:38AM MDT until May 04 at 11:06AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Utah... Emigration Creek In Emigration Canyon and east bench of Salt Lake City affecting Salt Lake County. Little Bear River At Paradise affecting Cache County. South Fork of The Ogden River Near Huntsville affecting Weber County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. For Emigration Creek on the east bench of Salt Lake City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast Tuesday and Wednesday evenings. * WHERE...Emigration Creek In Emigration Canyon and east bench of Salt Lake City. * WHEN...Until late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 130.0 CFS, minor flood damage will impact homes and structures along Emigration Creek, including areas of the Hogle Zoo. At 169.0 CFS, Moderate flooding will affect select homes and structures along Emigration Creek. Additionally, structures in the Hogle Zoo will receive damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM MDT Tuesday the flow was 127.0 CFS. - Forecast...Emigration Creek will continue to see increases in flow each evening to above flood flow, or 130 CFS, through at least Wednesday night, with the highest peaks forecast at 162 CFS. - Flood flow is 130.0 CFS. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Even 6 inches of fast-moving flood water can knock you off your feet and a depth of 2 feet will float your car. Never try to walk, swim, or drive through such swift water. If you come upon flood waters, stop, turn around and go another way. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued on an as needed basis, or by Wednesday at Noon MDT.
